catList: Fundamentals of oil, natural gas, coal, renewables, hydro,  nuclear and electricity supply chains. Global distribution, investment requirements, environmental effects, history of use and demand projections of each primary resource. Factors affecting supply, demand and price formation. Functioning of physical and financial energy markets. Roles of government policies. Focus on oil and gas markets: Global impact of key producing and consuming countries. Energy security and geopolitics. Case discussions on the geopolitical and economic implications of recent political and technological developments.

Oil, gas, coal, renewable, hydro, nuclear energy and electricity supply chains. Global availability of key energy resources, investment needs, environmental impact, historical use and demand projections. Factors influencing supply, demand and pricing. Global impact of policies adopted by leading resource producing and consuming countries. Energy security and geopolitics. Case studies on the geopolitical and economic impacts of current political and technological developments.
